features.description: Setup Responsive Bento Grid and Dark Theme
steps: Force entire app background to deep void black ('bg-slate-950') with subtle top-center radial gradient ('from-indigo-900/20 to-slate-950').
Initialize global layout in 'page.tsx' using CSS Grid. On mobile, use a single column ('grid-cols-1') with tighter padding ('p-4').
On desktop breakpoint (md+), switch to a 4-column Bento layout ('md:grid-cols-4') with larger padding ('md:p-8') and 'gap-6'.
Create reusable 'GlassCard' component: 'bg-white/5', 'backdrop-blur-xl', 'border-white/10', 'rounded-2xl md:rounded-3xl'.
Create Header component spanning full width ('col-span-full').
Use flex layout: Stack vertically centered on mobile ('flex-col items-center gap-4'), switch to row between on desktop ('md:flex-row md:justify-between').
Add logo text 'RALPH // OS' (mono font, tracking-widest).
Build toggle switch. 'OFF': gray, text 'MANUAL'. 'ON': neon green ('bg-emerald-400'), text 'RALPH: ONLINE', glowing shadow ('shadow-emerald-500/50').
Create 'CommitHeatmap' card. Ensure it spans full width on mobile ('col-span-1') and 2 columns on desktop ('md:col-span-2').
Render visible title 'CONTRIBUTION VELOCITY'.
Generate grid of small rounded squares representing daily work (adjust grid density for mobile if needed so it fits).
Fill 40% squares Emerald-500 (Human), 30% Violet-500 (Ralph Night Work).
Add glowing effect ('shadow-purple-500/50') only to Violet squares.
Create 'VelocityGauge' card (spans 1 col on mobile, 1 col on desktop).
Build semi-circle SVG arc with gradient stroke (Cyan to Purple). Ensure SVG scales responsively.
Place large number '4,250' in center with label 'TOKENS / HR'.
Apply CSS 'pulse' animation to the number.
Add footer text 'Optimization: Active' in small green text.
Create vertical card 'SYSTEM LOGS'. On mobile spanning 1 col, on desktop spanning 1 col but 2 rows height if possible ('md:row-span-2').
Style as terminal: dark bg, mono font, green cursor. Ensure text wraps nicely on smaller screens.
Render fake logs: '[03:14 AM] Refactoring utils.ts...', '[03:15 AM] 12 Tests Passed', '[03:18 AM] Deploying to Edge...'.
Highlight latest log entry in white.
